docs.snippet: The Atlantic sailed this morning at 8 o'clock for New York, with a large number of passengers, including Mrs. Gen. STEVENS and Gen, SHERMAN. We shall all welcome the return of the noble vessel to Port Royal.

docs.snippet: We have just received a mail from New-York, and there is, consequently, joy on board the saucy Gem of the Seas, as we are called. It is the first mail we have had since December, and we should still be without our letters and papers from home, were...

headline.main: THE SOUTH CAROLINA COAST.; The Bark Gem of the Sea off Georgetown Capture of the Schooner Fair Play.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have just received a mail from New-York, and there is, consequently, joy on board the saucy Gem of the Seas, as we are called. It is the first mail we have had since December, and we should still be without our letters and papers from home, were it not for the captain of another schooner.

docs.snippet: During all the horrors of last night, the steamers lying at this point, which were not too heavily laden with stores or too much filled with the wounded, were engaged in ferrying the troops belonging to NELSON'S Division from the opposite shore....

headline.main: THE SECOND DAY'S FIGHT.; THE WAR IN THE SOUTHWEST.

docs.lead_paragraph: During all the horrors of last night, the steamers lying at this point, which were not too heavily laden with stores or too much filled with the wounded, were engaged in ferrying the troops belonging to NELSON'S Division from the opposite shore. Every. load was greeted with cheers from those on shore, and returned hastily by those who had so opportunely arrived to take part in the battle of to-day.

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT THE STATE CAPITAL.; OUR ALBANY CORRESPONDENCE. The Progress of Legislation--Salt and Salt Statistics--The Albany City Elections--The Albany and Susquehannah Railroad--The Metropolitan Health Bill, &C.

docs.lead_paragraph: The progress of legislation may be onward, but it is not very exciting thus far this week. In the Senate, last evening, but little was done. headline.main: Office of County Judge Claim Bills Amending the Supply Bill New-York City Chartor-Torms of City Justices Railroad Fares.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate, last evening, held a short session. Mr. BELL introduced a bill providnig for vacating the office of County Judge when, for any reason, he shall have been absent from his post for 20 days. The bill, while general in its character, is particularly designed to hit the case of the Judge in Lewis County, who is now serving in an artillery company at Fortress Monroe. headline.main: FROM PORT ROYAL.; Arrival of Transports Locust Point and Parkersburgh.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steam transport Locust Point, Capt. FRENCH, from Port Royal, arrived yesterday afternoon, bringing dates to the 7th inst. She called in company with the steamship Parkersburgh, for NewYork, with the mails. The Cahawba would sail for New-York on the 10th.
